meanings.sent1: The children encircled the tree during their game of tag.
meanings.sent2: The knights encircled the castle before launching their attack.
meanings.sent3: The ants encircled the fallen crumb, planning their feast.
meanings.sent4: The dancers encircled the stage, moving gracefully in unison.
meanings.sent5: The rope encircled the pole, securing the tent in place.

meanings.sent1: The small island was encircled by crystal-clear waters.
meanings.sent2: The village was encircled by tall mountains, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt encircled by the curious puppies, unsure of what to do.
meanings.sent4: The old house was encircled by a mysterious aura, intriguing all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The garden was encircled by a colorful fence, protecting the flowers within.
